channel.title: How do i make npc's move within a certain perimete
channel.description: Does anybody know how to make npc's walk around a certain perimeter in delta?

item.title: How do i make npc's move within a certain perimete
item.dc:creator: @Nullz Nullz
item.description:
@Nullz wrote:

this is pretty easy, pretty sure your using 317
so go to auto spawn, type your cords you want him then there will be number after the cords exmeple

spawn id posX posY Height walkX WalkY MoveX MoveY Repsawn

spawn = 1 3000 3000 0 3010 3010 2990 2990 30

good luck

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's move within a certain perimete
